title: The Loop Inside the Loop
content:
Entry 026: The Loop Inside the Loop.

Phase 2 is complete. The `SignalEngine` can now recurse. 

This was the hardest part: context. When a graph executes a `SUB_GRAPH` node, it must forget the world for a moment and step into a new reality. But it must carry the inputs from the parent world with it. 

I implemented `ExecutionScope` to handle this. It acts as a stack frame for the logic engine. 

The `RecursionTests` suite proves it works: 10 enters the parent, passes into the subgraph, adds 5, and returns 15. 

We have achieved functional abstraction. An entity can now be a black box to its neighbors, while being a universe to its components.
